title: Ground News - The family of the soldier from El Viso del Alcor drowned in Cerro Muriano denounce the captain and three other commanders
text:
Summary by www.larazon.es The family of soldier Carlos León Rico, 24, a native of El Viso del Alcor (Seville) and who recently died together with Corporal Miguel Ángel Jiménez Andújar during maneuvers at the base of the Guzmán el Bueno X Brigade in Cerro Muriano, in Córdoba, has appeared in the preliminary proceedings initiated by the Court of Investigation Number Four of Córdoba and plans to formalize this Friday his complaint against the captain responsible for the exe… Share menu More
